Description: COLLECTING POOL OF CANDIDATES FOR OUR UPCOMING PROJECTS IN IRAQ!We are looking for a motivated and well-spoken Sales Representative for Fiber Optic Cable Sales to join our sales team. The Sales Representative will be responsible for vetting and developing new leads, communicating with customers, understanding their needs, and ensuring a smooth sales process. You should be able to support the sales process, close sales, and meet targets. To be successful as an Inside Sales Representative you should be able to build instant rapport and achieve customer satisfaction.Skills
Skills: A top Inside Sales Representative should also be very competitive, empathetic, and a good listener.

Extremely high energy
Driven and dynamic personality
Confident, strong interpersonal skills
Team player with highest level of integrity
Desire to exceed measurable performance goals
Organizational skills & a results-oriented self-starter attitude
Willing and desire to learn
